text: During the early morning of August 21, 2021, very heavy rainfall caused massive flash flooding across the western central part of Tennessee in the United States. It rained a total of before the flood. Many towns in Tennessee were damaged by floodwater, with many homes and businesses being destroyed. Over 22 people were killed with over 20 missing. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in the United States Category:2021 floods 2021 floods Category:August 2021 events Category:Floods in the United States
title: 2021 Tennessee floods
